name: Jack Keane 2 - The Fire Within
description: Run the original GOG installer (in a 32-bit wine prefix w/o DXVK)
notes:
Do not launch the game after installation from the original GOG installer, just close it using its "Exit" button.
Launch the game from the Lutris dialog instead.

files.goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer
game:
  appid: 236970
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Jacke Keane 2/JackKeane2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Create 32-bit wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /LANG=English /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Run GOG installer
    executable: goginstaller,
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: false
